children.text: The following AV item, a cover of the “Monster Mash”, was uploaded as an audio-event to be annotated for further analysis of the song’s influence on other renditions.

"Monster Mash" is performed by Alvin and the Chipmunks, featured in the animated special Trick or Treason, produced by Bagdasarian Productions and aired in 1994. The following clip is from the special and presents a family-friendly adaptation of the original song. The annotations are organized by the song’s transcription and structural elements.
